title: 1962 - Eegah, the giant 4K - The Crazed Love Of A Prehistoric Giant For A Ravishing Teen-Age Girl!

sources.title: 1962 - Eegah, the giant 4K - The Crazed Love Of A Prehistoric Giant For A Ravishing Teen-Age Girl!
sources.description:
When a desert giant falls for a teen queen!  Can a 7-foot crush survive the swinging 60s?
Free-spirited Roxy Miller stumbles upon Eegah - the last prehistoric giant - sparking a rescue mission when her adventurer father vanishes in the dunes. With boyfriend Tom Nelson, she confronts the gentle behemoth in his cave lair... but civilization proves deadlier than the Stone Age.

Original Title: Eegah! (1962)
